questions.text: When it comes to taste, you’re drawn to…

options.text:
Smooth and steady
the comfort playlist of coffee.

Bold and balanced
pure craft, zero shortcuts.

Whatever fits the mood
variety keeps things interesting.

The easy crowd-pleaser
hits the spot without overthinking it.

questions.text: When you’re at the machine, you…

options.text:
Geek out
pressure, grind, and tamp like it’s performance art.
Hit brew, zone out and trust the machine.

Treat it like a creative outlet
follow the recipe once, then make it yours.

Take everyone’s order
coffee diplomacy is your love language.

questions.text: When your cup hits the bench, it usually…

options.text:
Keeps it stripped-back
black, white, and effortlessly unfussy.

Looks engineered by NASA
precision, poise, serious intent.

Could start a micro-trend on TikTok
confident pour, main-character energy.

Feels like home
warm, familiar and a little nostalgic.

precisionist.title:
The
precisionist
precisionist.description1: You know perfection doesn't happen by accident it happens one micro-adjustment at a time. You're the type to notice when the crema's two seconds late.
precisionist.description2: Weight-based dosing and active temperature control keep every variable locked, so the details stay as dialled as you are.

optimiser.title:
The
optimiser
optimiser.description1: You're constantly experimenting with new methods, beans, and techniques. The next great cup is always just one experiment away.
optimiser.description2: You see every cup as a canvas for creativity. New beans, new methods, new possibilities - you're always chasing the next breakthrough.

roastician.title:
The
roastician
roastician.description1: You approach coffee as an art form, taking time to perfect every detail. The process is as important as the final cup.
roastician.description2: Every roast tells a story, and you're the author of each cup's journey from bean to brew.

baristocrat.title:
The
baristocrat
baristocrat.description1: For you, coffee is about connection. The best cups are shared with friends, family, or even strangers who become friends.
baristocrat.description2: Half the joy's in who you drink it with. Coffee is your social glue, bringing people together one cup at a time.

classicist.title:
The
classicist
classicist.description1: You find peace in the familiar rhythm of your coffee routine. Every morning follows the same pattern, and that's exactly how you like it.
classicist.description2: Your coffee ritual is sacred - same mug, same moment, same you. It's not just about the coffee, it's about grounding yourself in the familiar.

smooth_operator.title:
The
smooth operator
smooth_operator.description1: You make great coffee look easy. No fuss, no drama, just consistently perfect results.
smooth_operator.description2: Your coffee game is smooth as silk - reliable, refined, and always on point.

brewsmith.title:
The
brewsmith
brewsmith.description1: You're a master of the craft, blending tradition with innovation to create something uniquely yours.
brewsmith.description2: Every cup is a carefully crafted masterpiece, balancing technique with personal style.

home_brewer.title:
The
home brewer
home_brewer.description1: Your coffee is like a warm hug - familiar, comforting, and always there when you need it.
home_brewer.description2: Home is where the heart is, and your coffee is the heart of your home.

zen_brewer.title:
The
zen brewer
zen_brewer.description1: Coffee is your meditation. You find peace in the ritual, mindfulness in the process.
zen_brewer.description2: Each cup is a moment of zen - simple, pure, and perfectly present.

mood_swinger.title:
The
mood swinger
mood_swinger.description1: Your coffee changes with your mood - bold when you need energy, smooth when you need calm.
mood_swinger.description2: You're the chameleon of coffee, adapting your brew to match your vibe.

blendsetter.title:
The
blendsetter
blendsetter.description1: You're always ahead of the curve, discovering new flavors and techniques before they're cool.
blendsetter.description2: Your coffee choices inspire others. You're not just drinking coffee, you're defining it.

ritualist.title:
The
ritualist
ritualist.description1: Your coffee ritual is sacred - same mug, same moment, same you. It's not just about the coffee, it's about grounding yourself in the familiar.
ritualist.description2: Consistency is your comfort. Every morning follows the same pattern, and that's exactly how you like it.

everybuddy.title:
The
everybuddy
everybuddy.description1: You believe great coffee should be accessible to everyone. No pretension, just good coffee.
everybuddy.description2: Your coffee brings people together - simple, welcoming, and always satisfying.

percolator.title:
The
percolator
percolator.description1: You're the social catalyst of coffee. Your brew brings people together and keeps conversations flowing.
percolator.description2: Like a good percolator, you help ideas and connections bubble up through the power of coffee.

beanfluencer.title:
The
beanfluencer
beanfluencer.description1: You're the trendsetter of coffee culture. People look to you for what's next in the coffee world.
beanfluencer.description2: Your coffee choices influence others. You're not just drinking coffee, you're shaping coffee culture.

brewmantic.title:
The
brewmantic
brewmantic.description1: You see coffee as an expression of love. Every cup is made with care and shared with warmth.
brewmantic.description2: Your coffee is romantic - it's about connection, comfort, and creating beautiful moments.
